motds.id: X-wing Glider links to EGS Page
motds.title: X-wing Glider
motds.body: Grab the Vanguard Squadron X-wing Glider in the Item Shop now. Or, grab STAR WARS™: Squadrons on the Epic Games Store and get the Glider as a free bonus!

motds.id: Beach Bomber links to Item Shop
motds.title: Beach Bomber
motds.body: The queen of sunshine is ready to take on the summer by storm!

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!
